article_title: Truth Teller: Rep. Bill Cassidy and the Koch Brothers
article_text: - A new Democratic ad against Senate candidate Rep. Bill Cassidy, R-La., claims he's connected to the Koch brothers and their efforts to cut Social Security and aid for hurricane victims. We put the ad to the Truth Teller test. ()
